item.description: Iptables # Administration tool for IPv4 packet filtering and NAT 列出 Log 並顯示行數(--line-numbers) # sudo iptables -vnL --line-numbers 結合 “ACCEPT/DROP” & “LOG” # DROP + LOG # Create a Chain to log and drop sudo iptables -N LOG_DROP # populate its rules: sudo iptables -A LOG_DROP -j LOG --log-prefix "INPUT:DROP: " --log-level 6 sudo iptables -A LOG_DROP -j DROP
